column2: You are in the foyer of the old haunted house. The floors are creaky. It is quite dark in here.
You are in the dining room.
You are in the kitchen. It smells really bad in here.
You are in the hallway of the old haunted house. Spider webs hang from the ceiling.
You are in the sitting room. The furniture in this room is in bad shape.
You are in the library. It is dark and creepy in here.
You are in the bedroom of the old haunted house.
You are in a large walk-in closet.
